result.reason: The connection tree filter supports advanced syntax (regex, protocol, tags) but lacks a graphical interface, forcing users to memorize prefixes. Implementing UI controls (e.g., a filter type dropdown) will improve feature discoverability and usability.
result.approach: Modify ConnectionTreeWindow to include a split-button or dropdown menu next to the search box. This menu will provide options to insert filter prefixes (regex:, protocol:, tag:) or toggle filter modes, enhancing the existing text-based filtering system.
